items.question: How often is this status page updated?
items.answer: Our status checks run every 30 seconds to provide real-time monitoring of WPlace.live availability and performance.

items.question: What does 'degraded performance' mean?
items.answer: Degraded performance indicates that WPlace.live is accessible but may be experiencing slower response times, intermittent issues, or reduced functionality.

items.question: Why can't I access WPlace.live even when it shows as online?
items.answer: This could be due to regional network issues, your ISP blocking the site, browser cache problems, or local connectivity issues. Try the troubleshooting steps above.

items.question: How accurate are these status checks?
items.answer: Our checks are performed from multiple global locations to ensure accuracy. However, local network conditions may still affect your individual experience.

items.question: Can I get notifications when WPlace.live goes down?
items.answer: Yes, you can subscribe to status updates through the official status page or follow WPlace.live's social media accounts for real-time notifications.

items.question: What should I do if WPlace.live is down?
items.answer: If WPlace.live is confirmed down, the best approach is to wait for the service to be restored. Check official channels for updates on the expected resolution time.
